00185 bool drawMenu()
00186 {
00187 
00188         SDL_Rect buttonRect;
00189 
00190         SDL_SetAlpha(singlePlayerButton, SDL_SRCALPHA, 198);
00191         SDL_SetAlpha(splitScreenButton, SDL_SRCALPHA, 198);
00192         SDL_SetAlpha(exitButton, SDL_SRCALPHA, 198);
00193 
00194         buttonRect.x = g_screen->w - singlePlayerButton->w - 30;

00197         buttonRect.h = singlePlayerButton->h;

00200     {
00201                 
00202                 return false;

00301 void menuLoop()
00302 {
00303 
00304         SDL_Event e;
00305         
00306         while(SDL_PollEvent(&e)) {
00307         
00308                 if(e.type == SDL_QUIT)
00309                 {
00310 
00311                         g_inGame = false;
00312 
00313                         g_quitGame = true;
00314 
00315                 }
00316 
00317                 if(e.type == SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN)
00318                 {
00319 
00320                         if(e.button.x > 20)
00321                         {
00322 
00323                                 if(e.button.x < (20 + uncheckedSound->w))
00324                                 {
00325 
00326                                         if(e.button.y > (g_screen->h - uncheckedSound->h - uncheckedMusic->h - 40))
00327                                         {
00328 
00329                                                 if(e.button.y < (g_screen->h - uncheckedSound->h - 40))
00330                                                 {
00331 
00332                                                         if(g_soundEnabled)
00333                                                                 FSOUND_PlaySound(FSOUND_FREE, buttonSound);
00334 
00335                                                         g_musicEnabled = !g_musicEnabled;
00336 
00337                                                         if(g_musicEnabled)
00338                                                         {
00339                                                                 
00340                                                                 FSOUND_SetLoopMode(g_musicChannel = FSOUND_PlaySound(FSOUND_FREE, g_backgroundMusic), FSOUND_LOOP_NORMAL);
00341 
00342                                                         } else {
00343 
00344                                                                 FSOUND_StopSound(g_musicChannel);
00345 
00346                                                         }
00347 
00348                                                         outputConfiguration();
00349                                                         
00350                                                 }
00351 
00352                                         }
00353 
00354                                         if(e.button.y > (g_screen->h - uncheckedSound->h - 30))
00355                                         {
00356 
00357                                                 if(e.button.y < (g_screen->h - 30))
00358                                                 {
00359 
00360                                                         FSOUND_PlaySound(FSOUND_FREE, buttonSound);

00369                         
00370                                 }

00374                         if(e.button.x > (g_screen->w - exitButton->w - 30))

00376 
00377                                 if(e.button.x < (g_screen->w - 30))
00378                                 {
00379 
00380                                         if(e.button.y > (g_screen->h - singlePlayerButton->h - splitScreenButton->h - exitButton->h - 50))

00439

00442 
00443                         writeLog("Failed to draw game background.\n");
00444

00446

00448 
00449         }
00450 
00451         if(!drawMenu())
00452         {
00453 
00454                 if(!drawErrorMenu)
00455                 {
00456 
00457                         writeLog("Failed to draw menu.\n");
00458 
00459                 }
00460 
00461                 drawErrorMenu = true;
00462 
00463         }
00464 
00465         SDL_Delay(80);
